text: Dennis William Egan (March 3, 1947 â€“ June 28, 2022) was an American politician. He was a member of the Alaska Senate representing Juneau from 2009 to 2019. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was the Mayor of Juneau from 1995 to 2000. Before politics, he was a radio broadcaster for KINY. Egan was born in Juneau. Egan died on June 28, 2022 in Salem, Oregon at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American mayors Category:American radio personalities Category:People from Juneau, Alaska Category:Politicians from Alaska Category:Entertainers from Alaska Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dennis Egan
